      • rumble

        public void rumble(double power,
                   double time)
        Sets the rumble on the controller
        Parameters:
        power - The desired power of the rumble [0, 1]
        time - The time to rumble for in seconds

      • getDPadState

        public MustangController.DPadState getDPadState()
        gets angle of the DPad on the XBox controller pressed with increments of 45 degree angle.
        Returns:
        neutal or -1 when nothing is pressed; angles in increments of 45 degrees otherwise
